scripts.build: npm run build-cjs && npm run build-cjs-bundle && npm run build-esm && npm run build-esm-bundle && node postbuild-bundled.js & npm run build-types & npm run build-types-bundle
scripts.build-cjs-bundle: node prebuild-bundled.js && esbuild src/index-bundle-iife.ts --target=es2019 --bundle --sourcemap --loader:.wasm=binary --loader:.data=binary --outfile=dist/cjs-bundle/index.js --format=iife --external:fs --external:url --external:path --external:ws && node postbuild-bundled.js
scripts.build-esm-bundle: node prebuild-bundled.js && esbuild src/index-bundle.ts --target=es2019 --bundle --sourcemap --loader:.wasm=binary --loader:.data=binary --outfile=dist/esm-bundle/index.js --format=esm --external:fs --external:url --external:path --external:ws && node postbuild-bundled.js
